ball = sphere(radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True)
ground = box(pos=vector(0, -5, 0), size=vector(20, 0.2, 10), color=color.green)

g = 9.81
v0 = 10

def update_ball_orientation():
    ball.pos = vector(0, Orientation_I.x, 0)
    ball.velocity = vector(v0, 0, 0)

def update_animation():
    rate(100)
    while ball.pos.y > -5:
        ball.velocity.y -= g
        ball.pos += ball.velocity * 0.01
        if ball.pos.y < -5:
            ball.velocity.y *= -Elasticity_I

Orientation_I = vector(0, 0, 0)
Elasticity_I = 5

update_ball_orientation()
update_animation()
